<noinclude>
This template creates a warning box for highlighting critical information.

== Usage ==
<pre>
{{Warning|Your warning text here}}
</pre>

== Parameters ==
* '''1''' - The warning text (required)

[[Category:Templates]]
</noinclude><includeonly><div style="background-color:#fff3cd; border-left:4px solid #ffc107; padding:12px 15px; margin:15px 0;">
'''⚠️ Warning:''' {{{1}}}
</div></includeonly>
